about_the_game: GEE GrotEsquE 2 - iskra Perfekta - an epic indie game by an unknown Pole-Wenetyan developer - Brayan Kapibarotti. It is characterized by fast-paced action and a dark horror atmosphere. The leading factor behind the phenomenon of this game is its disturbing plot, and its profound message for the human race. In this game you become a participant in the dark experience of Brayan Kapibarotti. You play the game from a first-person perspective. The game provides several rich maps to explore where you need to complete tasks for advance. The game also includes retro shooter mechanics, which provides a large dose of arcade entertainment. The astonishing storyline is the most proudful feature of that game. The story of the game tells the story of Brayan adventure. While driving at night, was pushed off the road and rolled off a large cliff. He ends up in a gloomy, thicket-covered valley. At the bottom, he is saved from the accident by a deep man who announces that he knows why Brayan ended up in this valley and that they are both looking for the same person there... The specificity of this game is that it does not have a save system. Before playing the game, insure yourself for an hour to a maximum of two hours. In this game, making a mistake means you have to start over. Who will be able to complete this game?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.5GHz or AMD FX-4100 @ 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 6870 with 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: standard
